1.0.2.name: wordpress/wp-easy-backup
1.0.2.description:
It will create a database dump and zip all your media, theme and plugin files.

When moving from one to another hosting company this plugin can quickly zip everything you need in one click.

After installation, look under the Tools tab and open "WP Backup". Click on Generate WP Easy Backup Zip. Use the link to save the file.
